name: Verify Secret Discovery in Camera View
description: Validates that a secret white object can be discovered and scanned using the camera system.
testObjective: Ensure secret discovery mechanic functions correctly in region 2.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has access to the camera system

steps.action: Navigate to the cockpit and interact with the camera system
steps.expected: Camera view opens showing 0/1 in top right corner

steps.action: Search the camera view for a small white object
steps.expected: Small white object is visible in the camera view
System displays message: 'You discovered a secret'

postconditions: Counter remains at 0/1 (secrets don't count toward main scan progress)
